bill.summary:
Strategic Petroleum Reserve Security Assessment Act or the SPR Security Assessment Act
This bill directs the Department of Energy to annually report on any physical or cybersecurity incidents to a storage facility or a related facility of the Strategic Petroleum Reserve.
